mapper.select:
SELECT user_eno, br_cd, devc_uno, goods_cd, goods_qy, goods_type,
( SELECT br_nm FROM br_info
WHERE br_info.br_cd = invntry_info.br_cd AND br_info.user_eno = invntry_info.user_eno ) AS br_nm ,
( SELECT goods_cdnm FROM goods_cd_info WHERE invntry_info.goods_cd = goods_cd_info.goods_cd AND invntry_info.goods_type = goods_cd_info.goods_type ) AS goods_nm , ( SELECT goods_typenm FROM goods_type_info WHERE invntry_info.goods_type = goods_type_info.goods_type )AS goods_typenm
( SELECT br_nm FROM br_info WHERE invntry_info.br_cd = br_info.br_cd AND br_info.user_eno = #{USER_ENO} ) AS br_nm ,
( SELECT goods_cdnm FROM goods_cd_info WHERE invntry_info.goods_cd = goods_cd_info.goods_cd AND invntry_info.goods_type = goods_cd_info.goods_type ) AS goods_nm ,
( SELECT goods_typenm FROM goods_type_info WHERE invntry_info.goods_type = goods_type_info.goods_type )AS goods_typenm
FROM invntry_info
WHERE user_eno=#{USER_ENO}
WHERE br_cd=#{BR_CD} AND user_eno=#{USER_ENO}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM invntry_info WHERE br_cd=#{BR_CD} AND devc_uno = #{DEVC_UNO} AND goods_cd=#{GOODS_CD} AND user_eno=#{USER_ENO} AND goods_type = #{GOODS_TYPE}
mapper.select: SELECT devc_uno, (SELECT br_nm FROM br_info WHERE br_info.br_cd = br_devc_mapp.br_cd AND br_info.user_eno = br_devc_mapp.user_eno) AS br_nm FROM br_devc_mapp WHERE br_cd=#{BR_CD} AND user_eno=#{USER_ENO}
SELECT goods_type, goods_typenm FROM goods_type_info WHERE use_yn='Y'
SELECT goods_cd, goods_cdnm AS goods_nm FROM goods_cd_info WHERE goods_type =#{GOODS_TYPE}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO invntry_info(user_eno, br_cd, devc_uno, goods_type, goods_cd, goods_qy, reg_dt) VALUES (#{USER_ENO}, #{BR_CD}, #{DEVC_UNO}, #{GOODS_TYPE}, #{GOODS_CD}, #{GOODS_QY}, #{REG_DT})
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(delng_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS delng_date ,TO_CHAR(SUM(dlamt),'999,999,999,999,999')AS dlamt FROM sales_info WHERE user_eno = #{USER_ENO} AND TO_CHAR(delng_date,'MM') = #{DELNG_DATE} GROUP BY delng_date
